00151 INT32 GetFreeFace(void)
00152 {
00153       UINT32 uiCount;
00154 
00155       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumFaces; uiCount++)
00156       {
00157             if((gFacesData[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE) )
00158                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00159       }
00160 
00161       if(guiNumFaces < NUM_FACE_SLOTS )
00162             return((INT32)guiNumFaces++);
00163 
00164       return(-1);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void RecountFaces(void)
00168 {
00169 INT32 uiCount;
00170 
00171       for(uiCount=guiNumFaces-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00172       {
00173             if( ( gFacesData[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00174             {
00175                   guiNumFaces=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00176                   break;
00177             }
00178       }
00179 }

00182 INT32 InitSoldierFace( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00183 {
00184       INT32                                     iFaceIndex;
00185 
00186       // Check if we have a face init already
00187       iFaceIndex = pSoldier->iFaceIndex;
00188       
00189       if ( iFaceIndex != -1 )
00190       {
00191             return( iFaceIndex );
00192       }
00193 
00194       return( InitFace( pSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubID, 0) );
00195 }

00198 INT32 InitFace( UINT8 usMercProfileID, UINT8 ubSoldierID, UINT32 uiInitFlags )
00199 {
00200       UINT32      uiBlinkFrequency;
00201       UINT32      uiExpressionFrequency;
00202 
00203       if ( usMercProfileID == NO_PROFILE )
00204       {
00205             return( -1 );
00206       }
00207 
00208       uiBlinkFrequency              = gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].uiBlinkFrequency;
00209       uiExpressionFrequency   = gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].uiExpressionFrequency;
00210 
00211       if ( Random( 2 ) )
00212       {
00213             uiBlinkFrequency        += Random( 2000 );
00214       }
00215       else
00216       {
00217             uiBlinkFrequency        -= Random( 2000 );
00218       }
00219 
00220       return( InternalInitFace( usMercProfileID, ubSoldierID, uiInitFlags, gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].ubFaceIndex, uiBlinkFrequency, uiExpressionFrequency ) );
00221 
00222 }

00225 INT32 InternalInitFace( UINT8 usMercProfileID, UINT8 ubSoldierID, UINT32 uiInitFlags, INT32 iFaceFileID, UINT32 uiBlinkFrequency, UINT32 uiExpressionFrequency )
00226 {
00227       FACETYPE                            *pFace;
00228   VOBJECT_DESC                VObjectDesc;
00229       UINT32                                    uiVideoObject;
00230       INT32                                     iFaceIndex;
00231       ETRLEObject                   ETRLEObject;
00232       HVOBJECT                            hVObject;
00233       UINT32                                    uiCount;
00234       SGPPaletteEntry         Pal[256];
00235 
00236       if( ( iFaceIndex = GetFreeFace() )==(-1) )
00237             return(-1);
00238 
00239       // Load face file
00240       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00241 
00242       // ATE: If we are merc profile ID #151-154, all use 151's protrait....
00243       if ( usMercProfileID >= 151 && usMercProfileID <= 154 )
00244       {
00245             iFaceFileID = 151;
00246       }
00247 
00248 
00249       // Check if we are a big-face....
00250       if ( uiInitFlags & FACE_BIGFACE )
00251       {
00252             // The filename is the profile ID!
00253             if( iFaceFileID < 100 )
00254             {
00255                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%02d.sti", iFaceFileID );
00256             }
00257             else
00258             {
00259                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%03d.sti", iFaceFileID );
00260             }
00261 
00262     // ATE: Check for profile - if elliot , use special face :)
00263     if ( usMercProfileID == ELLIOT )
00264     {
00265       if ( gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData > 3 && gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData < 7 )
00266       {
00267                     sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%02da.sti", iFaceFileID );
00268       }
00269       else if ( gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData > 6 && gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData < 10 )
00270       {
00271                     sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%02db.sti", iFaceFileID );
00272       }
00273       else if ( gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData > 9 && gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData < 13 )
00274       {
00275                     sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%02dc.sti", iFaceFileID );
00276       }
00277       else if ( gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData > 12 && gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData < 16 )
00278       {
00279                     sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%02dd.sti", iFaceFileID );
00280       }
00281       else if ( gMercProfiles[ ELLIOT ].bNPCData == 17 )
00282       {
00283                     sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\b%02de.sti", iFaceFileID );
00284       }
00285     }
00286       else if ( usMercProfileID == TEX )
00287     {
00288       if( gMercProfiles[ TEX ].bSkillTrait2 == CAMOUFLAGED )
00289       {
00290                     sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\B167c.sti" );
00291       }
00292             }
00293 
00294       }
00295       else
00296       {
00297 
00298             if( iFaceFileID < 100 )
00299             {
00300                   // The filename is the profile ID!
00301                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\%02d.sti", iFaceFileID );
00302             }
00303             else
00304             {
00305                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\%03d.sti", iFaceFileID );
00306             }
00307       }
00308 
00309       // Load
00310       if( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiVideoObject ) == FALSE )
00311       {
00312             // If we are a big face, use placeholder...
00313             if ( uiInitFlags & FACE_BIGFACE )
00314             {
00315                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "FACES\\placeholder.sti" );
00316 
00317                   if( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiVideoObject ) == FALSE )
00318                   {
00319                         return( -1 );
00320                   }
00321             }
00322             else
00323             {
00324                   return( -1 );
00325             }
00326       }
00327 
00328       memset(&gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ], 0, sizeof( FACETYPE ) );
00329 
00330       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00331 
00332       // Get profile data and set into face data
00333       pFace->ubSoldierID            = ubSoldierID;
00334 
00335       pFace->iID                                = iFaceIndex;
00336       pFace->fAllocated             = TRUE;
00337 
00338       //Default to off!
00339       pFace->fDisabled              = TRUE;  
00340       pFace->iVideoOverlay    = -1;
00341       //pFace->uiEyeDelay                 =     gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].uiEyeDelay;
00342       //pFace->uiMouthDelay         = gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].uiMouthDelay;
00343       pFace->uiEyeDelay             =     50 + Random( 30 );
00344       pFace->uiMouthDelay           = 120;
00345       pFace->ubCharacterNum = usMercProfileID;
00346 
00347 
00348       pFace->uiBlinkFrequency              = uiBlinkFrequency;
00349       pFace->uiExpressionFrequency = uiExpressionFrequency;
00350 
00351       pFace->sEyeFrame        =           0;
00352       pFace->sMouthFrame      =           0;
00353       pFace->uiFlags                =  uiInitFlags;
00354 
00355 
00356       // Set palette
00357       if( GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiVideoObject ) )
00358       {
00359             // Build a grayscale palette! ( for testing different looks )
00360             for(uiCount=0; uiCount < 256; uiCount++)
00361             {
00362                   Pal[uiCount].peRed=255;
00363                   Pal[uiCount].peGreen=255;
00364                   Pal[uiCount].peBlue=255;
00365             }
00366 
00367             hVObject->pShades[ FLASH_PORTRAIT_NOSHADE ]             = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
00368             hVObject->pShades[ FLASH_PORTRAIT_STARTSHADE ]  = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( Pal, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
00369             hVObject->pShades[ FLASH_PORTRAIT_ENDSHADE ]          = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 250, 25, 25, TRUE );
00370             hVObject->pShades[ FLASH_PORTRAIT_DARKSHADE ]         = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 100, 100, 100, TRUE );
00371             hVObject->pShades[ FLASH_PORTRAIT_LITESHADE ]         = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 100, 100, 100, FALSE );
00372 
00373             for(uiCount=0; uiCount < 256; uiCount++)
00374             {
00375                   Pal[uiCount].peRed=(UINT8)(uiCount%128)+128;
00376                   Pal[uiCount].peGreen=(UINT8)(uiCount%128)+128;
00377                   Pal[uiCount].peBlue=(UINT8)(uiCount%128)+128;
00378             }
00379             hVObject->pShades[ FLASH_PORTRAIT_GRAYSHADE ]         = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( Pal, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
00380 
00381       }
00382 
00383 
00384       // Get FACE height, width
00385       if( GetVideoObjectETRLEPropertiesFromIndex( uiVideoObject, &ETRLEObject, 0 ) == FALSE )
00386       {
00387             return( -1 );
00388       }
00389       pFace->usFaceWidth = ETRLEObject.usWidth;
00390       pFace->usFaceHeight = ETRLEObject.usHeight;
00391 
00392 
00393       // OK, check # of items
00394       if ( hVObject->usNumberOfObjects == 8 )
00395       {
00396             pFace->fInvalidAnim = FALSE;
00397 
00398             // Get EYE height, width
00399             if( GetVideoObjectETRLEPropertiesFromIndex( uiVideoObject, &ETRLEObject, 1 ) == FALSE )
00400             {
00401                   return( -1 );
00402             }
00403             pFace->usEyesWidth = ETRLEObject.usWidth;
00404             pFace->usEyesHeight = ETRLEObject.usHeight;
00405 
00406 
00407             // Get Mouth height, width
00408             if( GetVideoObjectETRLEPropertiesFromIndex( uiVideoObject, &ETRLEObject, 5 ) == FALSE )
00409             {
00410                   return( -1 );
00411             }
00412             pFace->usMouthWidth = ETRLEObject.usWidth;
00413             pFace->usMouthHeight = ETRLEObject.usHeight;
00414       }
00415       else
00416       {
00417             pFace->fInvalidAnim = TRUE;
00418       }
00419 
00420       // Set id
00421       pFace->uiVideoObject = uiVideoObject;
00422 
00423       return( iFaceIndex );
00424 
00425 }

00435 
00436 void DeleteFace( INT32 iFaceIndex )
00437 {
00438       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
00439 
00440       // Check face index
00441       CHECKV( iFaceIndex != -1 );
00442 
00443       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00444 
00445       // Check for a valid slot!
00446       CHECKV( pFace->fAllocated != FALSE );
00447 
00448   pFace->fCanHandleInactiveNow = TRUE;
00449 
00450       if ( !pFace->fDisabled )
00451       {
00452             SetAutoFaceInActive( iFaceIndex );
00453       }
00454 
00455       // If we are still talking, stop!
00456       if ( pFace->fTalking )
00457       {
00458             // Call dialogue handler function
00459             pFace->fTalking = FALSE;
00460 
00461             HandleDialogueEnd( pFace );
00462       }
00463 
00464       // Delete vo      
00465       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( pFace->uiVideoObject );
00466       
00467       // Set uncallocated
00468       pFace->fAllocated = FALSE;
00469 
00470       RecountFaces( );
00471 
00472 }

00484 
00485 void GetFaceRelativeCoordinates( FACETYPE *pFace, UINT16 *pusEyesX, UINT16 *pusEyesY, UINT16 *pusMouthX, UINT16 *pusMouthY )
00486 {
00487       UINT16                                    usMercProfileID;
00488       UINT16                                    usEyesX;
00489       UINT16                                    usEyesY;
00490       UINT16                                    usMouthX;
00491       UINT16                                    usMouthY;
00492       INT32                                     cnt;
00493 
00494       usMercProfileID = pFace->ubCharacterNum;
00495 
00496       //Take eyes x,y from profile unless we are an RPC and we are small faced.....
00497       usEyesX                       = gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].usEyesX;
00498       usEyesY                       = gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].usEyesY;
00499       usMouthY                =     gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].usMouthY;
00500       usMouthX                = gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].usMouthX;
00501 
00502       //if( usMercProfileID == TEX && gMercProfiles[ TEX ].bSkillTrait2 == CAMOUFLAGED )
00503       //{
00504       //    usEyesX                       = 13;
00505       //    usEyesY                       = 34;
00506       //    usMouthX                = 13;
00507       //    usMouthY                = 55;
00508       //}
00509 
00510   // Use some other values for x,y, base on if we are a RPC!
00511       if ( !( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_BIGFACE ) ||( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_FORCE_SMALL ))
00512       {
00513             if (usMercProfileID == TEX)
00514             {
00515                   //     3,   6,    3,    23,         // Tex                  ( 64 )
00516                   usEyesX                       = 3;
00517                   usEyesY                       = 6;
00518                   usMouthX                = 3;
00519                   usMouthY                = 23;
00520             }
00521             else if (usMercProfileID == BIGGENS)
00522             {
00523                   //     5, 6,  5,  25,         // Biggens  ( 61 )
00524                   usEyesX                       = 5;
00525                   usEyesY                       = 6;
00526                   usMouthX                = 5;
00527                   usMouthY                = 25;
00528 
00529             }
00530             // Are we a recruited merc? .. or small?
00531             else if( ( gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].ubMiscFlags & ( PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED | PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_EPCACTIVE ) ) ||( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_FORCE_SMALL ) )
00532             {
00533                   // Loop through all values of availible merc IDs to find ours!
00534                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubRPCNumSmallFaceValues; cnt++ )
00535                   {
00536                         // We've found one!
00537                         if ( gubRPCSmallFaceProfileNum[ cnt ] == usMercProfileID )
00538                         {
00539                               usEyesX                       = gRPCSmallFaceValues[ cnt ].bEyesX;
00540                               usEyesY                       = gRPCSmallFaceValues[ cnt ].bEyesY;
00541                               usMouthY                =     gRPCSmallFaceValues[ cnt ].bMouthY;
00542                               usMouthX                = gRPCSmallFaceValues[ cnt ].bMouthX;
00543                         }
00544                   }
00545 
00546             }
00547       }
00548 
00549       (*pusEyesX)       = usEyesX;
00550       (*pusEyesY)       = usEyesY;
00551       (*pusMouthX)      = usMouthX;
00552       (*pusMouthY)      = usMouthY;
00553 
00554 }

00557 void SetAutoFaceActive( UINT32 uiDisplayBuffer, UINT32 uiRestoreBuffer, INT32 iFaceIndex , UINT16 usFaceX, UINT16 usFaceY )
00558 {
00559       UINT16                                    usEyesX;
00560       UINT16                                    usEyesY;
00561       UINT16                                    usMouthX;
00562       UINT16                                    usMouthY;
00563       FACETYPE                            *pFace;
00564 
00565       // Check face index
00566       CHECKV( iFaceIndex != -1 );
00567 
00568       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00569

00571

00573

00576 
00577 void InternalSetAutoFaceActive( UINT32 uiDisplayBuffer, UINT32 uiRestoreBuffer, INT32 iFaceIndex , UINT16 usFaceX, UINT16 usFaceY, UINT16 usEyesX, UINT16 usEyesY, UINT16 usMouthX, UINT16 usMouthY )
00578 {
00579       UINT16                                    usMercProfileID;
00580       FACETYPE                            *pFace;
00581       VSURFACE_DESC                 vs_desc;
00582       UINT16                                    usWidth;
00583       UINT16                                    usHeight;
00584       UINT8                                     ubBitDepth;
00585 
00586       // Check face index
00587       CHECKV( iFaceIndex != -1 );
00588 
00589       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00590 
00591       // IF we are already being contained elsewhere, return without doing anything!
00592 
00593       // ATE: Don't allow another activity from setting active....
00594       if ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE )
00595       {
00596             return;
00597       }
00598 
00599       // Check if we are active already, remove if so!
00600       if ( pFace->fDisabled )
00601       {
00602             SetAutoFaceInActive( iFaceIndex );
00603       }
00604 
00605       if ( uiRestoreBuffer == FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER )
00606       {
00607             // BUILD A BUFFER
00608             GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00609             // OK, ignore screen widths, height, only use BPP 
00610             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00611             vs_desc.usWidth = pFace->usFaceWidth;
00612             vs_desc.usHeight = pFace->usFaceHeight;
00613             vs_desc.ubBitDepth = ubBitDepth;
00614 
00615             pFace->fAutoRestoreBuffer  = TRUE;
00616 
00617             CHECKV( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &(pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer)  ) );
00618       }
00619       else
00620       {
00621             pFace->fAutoRestoreBuffer  = FALSE;
00622             pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer = uiRestoreBuffer;
00623       }
00624 
00625       if ( uiDisplayBuffer == FACE_AUTO_DISPLAY_BUFFER )
00626       {
00627             // BUILD A BUFFER
00628             GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00629             // OK, ignore screen widths, height, only use BPP 
00630             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00631             vs_desc.usWidth = pFace->usFaceWidth;
00632             vs_desc.usHeight = pFace->usFaceHeight;
00633             vs_desc.ubBitDepth = ubBitDepth;
00634 
00635             pFace->fAutoDisplayBuffer  = TRUE;
00636 
00637             CHECKV( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &(pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer)  ) );
00638       }
00639       else
00640       {
00641             pFace->fAutoDisplayBuffer  = FALSE;
00642             pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer = uiDisplayBuffer;
00643       }
00644 
00645 
00646       usMercProfileID = pFace->ubCharacterNum;
00647 
00648       pFace->usFaceX                      = usFaceX;
00649       pFace->usFaceY                      = usFaceY;
00650       pFace->fCanHandleInactiveNow = FALSE;
00651 
00652 
00653       //Take eyes x,y from profile unless we are an RPC and we are small faced.....
00654       pFace->usEyesX                      = usEyesX + usFaceX;
00655       pFace->usEyesY                      = usEyesY + usFaceY;
00656       pFace->usMouthY                     =     usMouthY + usFaceY;
00657       pFace->usMouthX                     = usMouthX + usFaceX;
00658 
00659       // Save offset values
00660       pFace->usEyesOffsetX                      = usEyesX;
00661       pFace->usEyesOffsetY                      = usEyesY;
00662       pFace->usMouthOffsetY                     =     usMouthY;
00663       pFace->usMouthOffsetX                     = usMouthX;
00664       
00665 
00666       if ( pFace->usEyesY == usFaceY || pFace->usMouthY == usFaceY )
00667       {
00668             pFace->fInvalidAnim = TRUE;
00669       }
00670 
00671       pFace->fDisabled              =     FALSE;
00672       pFace->uiLastBlink                  =           GetJA2Clock();
00673       pFace->uiLastExpression =           GetJA2Clock();
00674       pFace->uiEyelast                    =           GetJA2Clock();
00675       pFace->fStartFrame                  =  TRUE;
00676 
00677       // Are we a soldier?
00678       if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
00679       {
00680              pFace->bOldSoldierLife = MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bLife;
00681       }
00682 }
00683 
00684 
00685 void SetAutoFaceInActiveFromSoldier( UINT8 ubSoldierID )
00686 {
00687       // Check for valid soldier
00688       CHECKV( ubSoldierID != NOBODY );
00689 
00690       SetAutoFaceInActive( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->iFaceIndex );
00691 }

00693 
00694 void SetAutoFaceInActive(INT32 iFaceIndex )
00695 {
00696       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
00697       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
00698 
00699       // Check face index
00700       CHECKV( iFaceIndex != -1 );
00701 
00702       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00703 
00704       // Check for a valid slot!
00705       CHECKV( pFace->fAllocated != FALSE );
00706 
00707 
00708       // Turn off some flags
00709       if ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE )
00710       {
00711             if ( !pFace->fCanHandleInactiveNow )
00712             {
00713                   return;
00714             }
00715       }
00716 
00717       if ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_MAKEACTIVE_ONCE_DONE )
00718       {
00719             // 
00720             if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
00721             {
00722                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ];
00723 
00724                   // IF we are in tactical
00725                   if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == iCurrentTacticalSquad && guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00726                   {
00727                         // Make the interfac panel dirty..
00728                         // This will dirty the panel next frame...
00729                         gfRerenderInterfaceFromHelpText = TRUE;
00730                   }
00731 
00732             }
00733 
00734       }
00735 
00736       if ( pFace->fAutoRestoreBuffer )
00737       {
00738             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer );
00739       }
00740 
00741       if ( pFace->fAutoDisplayBuffer )
00742       {
00743             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer );
00744       }
00745 
00746       if ( pFace->iVideoOverlay != -1 )
00747       {
00748             RemoveVideoOverlay( pFace->iVideoOverlay );
00749             pFace->iVideoOverlay = -1;
00750       }
00751 
00752       // Turn off some flags
00753       pFace->uiFlags &= ( ~FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE );
00754       
00755       // Disable!
00756       pFace->fDisabled = TRUE;
00757       
00758 }
00759 
00760 
00761 void SetAllAutoFacesInactive(  )
00762 {
00763       UINT32 uiCount;
00764       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
00765 
00766       for ( uiCount = 0; uiCount < guiNumFaces; uiCount++ )
00767       {
00768             if ( gFacesData[ uiCount ].fAllocated )
00769             {
00770                   pFace = &gFacesData[ uiCount ];
00771 
00772                   SetAutoFaceInActive( uiCount );
00773             }
00774       }
00775 }

00777 
00778 
00779 void BlinkAutoFace( INT32 iFaceIndex )
00780 {
00781       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
00782       INT16                               sFrame;
00783       BOOLEAN                             fDoBlink = FALSE;
00784 
00785       if ( gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fAllocated && !gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fDisabled && !gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fInvalidAnim )
00786       {
00787             pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00788 
00789             // CHECK IF BUDDY IS DEAD, UNCONSCIOUS, ASLEEP, OR POW!
00790             if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
00791             {
00792                   if ( ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bLife < OKLIFE ) ||
00793                                ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->fMercAsleep == TRUE ) ||
00794                                ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
00795                   {
00796                         return;
00797                   }
00798             }
00799 
00800             if ( pFace->ubExpression == NO_EXPRESSION )
00801             {
00802                   // Get Delay time, if the first frame, use a different delay
00803                   if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiLastBlink ) > pFace->uiBlinkFrequency )
00804                   {
00805                         pFace->uiLastBlink = GetJA2Clock();
00806                         pFace->ubExpression = BLINKING;
00807                         pFace->uiEyelast = GetJA2Clock();
00808                   }
00809 
00810                   if ( pFace->fAnimatingTalking )
00811                   {
00812                         if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiLastExpression ) > pFace->uiExpressionFrequency )
00813                         {
00814                               pFace->uiLastExpression = GetJA2Clock();
00815 
00816                               if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 )
00817                               {
00818                                     pFace->ubExpression = ANGRY;
00819                               }
00820                               else
00821                               {
00822                                     pFace->ubExpression = SURPRISED;
00823                               }
00824                         }
00825 
00826                   }
00827 
00828             }
00829 
00830             if ( pFace->ubExpression != NO_EXPRESSION )
00831             {
00832                   if ( pFace->fStartFrame )
00833                   {
00834                         if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiEyelast ) > pFace->uiEyeDelay ) //> Random( 10000 ) )
00835                         {
00836                               fDoBlink                                  = TRUE;
00837                               pFace->fStartFrame      = FALSE;
00838                         }
00839                   }
00840                   else
00841                   {
00842                         if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiEyelast ) > pFace->uiEyeDelay )
00843                         {
00844                               fDoBlink = TRUE;
00845                         }
00846                   }
00847 
00848                   // Are we going to blink?
00849                   if ( fDoBlink )
00850                   {
00851                         pFace->uiEyelast = GetJA2Clock();
00852 
00853                         // Adjust
00854                         NewEye( pFace );
00855                   
00856                         sFrame = pFace->sEyeFrame;
00857 
00858                         if ( sFrame >= 5 )
00859                         {
00860                               sFrame = 4;
00861                         }
00862 
00863                         if ( sFrame > 0 )
00864                         {
00865                               // Blit Accordingly!
00866                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, (INT16)( sFrame ), pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00867 
00868                               if ( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer == FRAME_BUFFER )
00869                               {
00870                                     InvalidateRegion( pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY, pFace->usEyesX + pFace->usEyesWidth, pFace->usEyesY + pFace->usEyesHeight );
00871                               }
00872                         }
00873                         else
00874                         {
00875                               //RenderFace( uiDestBuffer , uiCount );
00876                               pFace->ubExpression = NO_EXPRESSION;
00877                               // Update rects just for eyes
00878                               
00879                               if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
00880                               {
00881                                     FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY, pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY, pFace->usEyesWidth, pFace->usEyesHeight );
00882                               }
00883                               else
00884                               {
00885                                     FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY, pFace->usEyesOffsetX, pFace->usEyesOffsetY, pFace->usEyesWidth, pFace->usEyesHeight );
00886                               }
00887 
00888                         }
00889 
00890                         HandleRenderFaceAdjustments( pFace, TRUE, FALSE, 0, pFace->usFaceX, pFace->usFaceY, pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY );
00891 
00892                   }
00893             }
00894 
00895       }
00896 
00897 }
00898 
00899 
00900 void HandleFaceHilights( FACETYPE *pFace, UINT32 uiBuffer, INT16 sFaceX, INT16 sFaceY )
00901 {
00902       UINT32                              uiDestPitchBYTES;
00903       UINT8                               *pDestBuf;
00904       UINT16                              usLineColor;
00905       INT32                               iFaceIndex;
00906 
00907       iFaceIndex = pFace->iID;
00908 
00909   if ( !gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fDisabled )
00910   {
00911             if ( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer == FRAME_BUFFER && guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00912     {
00913           // If we are highlighted, do this now!
00914           if ( ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_WHITE_HILIGHT ) )
00915           {
00916                 // Lock buffer
00917                 pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00918                 SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, sFaceX-2, sFaceY-1, sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 4, sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight + 4 );
00919 
00920                 usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) );
00921                 RectangleDraw( TRUE, (sFaceX - 2 ), (sFaceY - 1),sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 1, sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight , usLineColor, pDestBuf );
00922 
00923                 SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00924 
00925                 UnLockVideoSurface( uiBuffer );                   
00926           }
00927           else if ( ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_MOVING_HILIGHT  ) )
00928           {
00929                 if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
00930                 {
00931                       if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00932                       {
00933                             // Lock buffer
00934                             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00935                             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, sFaceX-2, sFaceY-1, sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 4, sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight + 4 );
00936                             
00937                             if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bStealthMode )
00938                             {
00939                                   usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 158, 158, 12 ) );
00940                             }
00941                             else
00942                             {
00943                                   usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 12, 118 ) );
00944                             }
00945                 RectangleDraw( TRUE, (sFaceX - 2 ), (sFaceY - 1),sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 1, sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight , usLineColor, pDestBuf );
00946 
00947                             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00948 
00949                             UnLockVideoSurface( uiBuffer );                   
00950                       }
00951                 }
00952           }
00953       else
00954       {
00955         // ATE: Zero out any highlight boxzes....
00956                 // Lock buffer
00957                 pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00958                 SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, pFace->usFaceX-2, pFace->usFaceY-1, pFace->usFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 4, pFace->usFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight + 4 );
00959 
00960                 usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) );
00961                 RectangleDraw( TRUE, (pFace->usFaceX - 2 ), (pFace->usFaceY - 1), pFace->usFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 1, pFace->usFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight , usLineColor, pDestBuf );
00962 
00963                 SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00964 
00965                 UnLockVideoSurface( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer );                   
00966       }
00967     }
00968   }
00969 
00970 
00971       if ( ( pFace->fCompatibleItems && !gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fDisabled ) )
00972       {
00973             // Lock buffer
00974             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00975             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, sFaceX-2, sFaceY-1, sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth+ 4, sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight + 4 );
00976 
00977             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 0, 0 ) );
00978             RectangleDraw( TRUE, (sFaceX - 2), (sFaceY - 1), sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth + 1, sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight , usLineColor, pDestBuf );
00979 
00980             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00981 
00982             UnLockVideoSurface( uiBuffer );                       
00983       }
00984 
00985 }
00986 
00987 
00988 void MouthAutoFace( INT32 iFaceIndex )
00989 {
00990       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
00991       INT16                               sFrame;
00992 
00993       if ( gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fAllocated  )
00994       {
00995             pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00996 
00997             // Remove video overlay is present....
00998             if ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_DESTROY_OVERLAY )
00999             {
01000                   //if ( pFace->iVideoOverlay != -1 )
01001                   //{
01002                   //    if ( pFace->uiStopOverlayTimer != 0 )
01003                   //    {
01004                   //          if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - pFace->uiStopOverlayTimer ) > END_FACE_OVERLAY_DELAY )
01005                   //          {
01006                               //    RemoveVideoOverlay( pFace->iVideoOverlay );
01007                   //                pFace->iVideoOverlay = -1;
01008                   //          }
01009                   //    }
01010                   //}
01011             }
01012 
01013             if ( pFace->fTalking )
01014             {
01015                   if ( !gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fDisabled && !gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fInvalidAnim )
01016                   {
01017                         if ( pFace->fAnimatingTalking )
01018                         {
01019                               PollAudioGap( pFace->uiSoundID, &(pFace->GapList ) );
01020 
01021                               // Check if we have an audio gap
01022                               if ( pFace->GapList.audio_gap_active )
01023                               {
01024                                     pFace->sMouthFrame = 0;
01025 
01026                                     if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
01027                                     {
01028                                           FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
01029                                     }
01030                                     else
01031                                     {
01032                                           FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthOffsetX, pFace->usMouthOffsetY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
01033                                     }
01034 
01035                               }
01036                               else
01037                               {
01038                                     // Get Delay time
01039                                     if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiMouthlast ) > pFace->uiMouthDelay )
01040                                     {
01041                                           pFace->uiMouthlast = GetJA2Clock();
01042 
01043                                           // Adjust
01044                                           NewMouth( pFace );
01045                                     
01046                                           sFrame = pFace->sMouthFrame;
01047 
01048                                           if ( sFrame > 0 )
01049                                           {
01050                                                 // Blit Accordingly!
01051                                                 BltVideoObjectFromIndex( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, (INT16)( sFrame + 4 ), pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01052 
01053                                                 // Update rects
01054                                                 if ( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer == FRAME_BUFFER )
01055                                                 {
01056                                                       InvalidateRegion( pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthX + pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthY + pFace->usMouthHeight );
01057                                                 }
01058                                           }
01059                                           else
01060                                           {
01061                                                 //RenderFace( uiDestBuffer , uiCount );
01062                                                 //pFace->fTaking = FALSE;
01063                                                 // Update rects just for Mouth
01064                                                 if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
01065                                                 {
01066                                                       FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
01067                                                 }
01068                                                 else
01069                                                 {
01070                                                       FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthOffsetX, pFace->usMouthOffsetY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
01071                                                 }
01072 
01073                                           }
01074 
01075                                           HandleRenderFaceAdjustments( pFace, TRUE, FALSE, 0, pFace->usFaceX, pFace->usFaceY, pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY );
01076 
01077                                     }
01078                               }
01079                         }
01080                   }
01081             }
01082 
01083             if  ( !( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE ) )
01084             {
01085                   HandleFaceHilights( pFace, pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer, pFace->usFaceX, pFace->usFaceY );
01086             }
01087       }
01088 }
01089 
01090 
01091 void HandleTalkingAutoFace( INT32 iFaceIndex )
01092 {
01093       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
01094 
01095       if ( gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].fAllocated  )
01096       {
01097             pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
01098 
01099             if ( pFace->fTalking )
01100             {
01101                   // Check if we are done!      ( Check this first! )
01102                   if ( pFace->fValidSpeech )
01103                   {
01104                         // Check if we have finished, set some flags for the final delay down if so!
01105                         if ( !SoundIsPlaying( pFace->uiSoundID ) && !pFace->fFinishTalking )
01106                         {
01107                               SetupFinalTalkingDelay( pFace );
01108                         }
01109                   }
01110                   else
01111                   {
01112                         // Check if our delay is over
01113                         if ( !pFace->fFinishTalking )
01114                         {
01115                               if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiTalkingTimer ) > pFace->uiTalkingDuration )
01116                               {
01117                                     // If here, setup for last delay!
01118                                     SetupFinalTalkingDelay( pFace );
01119 
01120                               }
01121                         }
01122                   }
01123 
01124                   // Now check for end of talking
01125                   if ( pFace->fFinishTalking )
01126                   {
01127                               if ( ( GetJA2Clock() - pFace->uiTalkingTimer ) > pFace->uiTalkingDuration )
01128                               {
01129                                     pFace->fTalking    = FALSE;
01130                                     pFace->fAnimatingTalking = FALSE;
01131                               
01132                                     // Remove gap info
01133                                     AudioGapListDone( &(pFace->GapList) );
01134 
01135                                     // Remove video overlay is present....
01136                                     if ( pFace->iVideoOverlay != -1 )
01137                                     {
01138                                           //if ( pFace->uiStopOverlayTimer == 0 )
01139                                           //{
01140                                           //    pFace->uiStopOverlayTimer = GetJA2Clock();
01141                                           //}
01142                                     }
01143 
01144                                     // Call dialogue handler function
01145                                     HandleDialogueEnd( pFace );
01146                               }
01147                   }
01148             }
01149       }
01150 }
01151 
01152 
01153 // Local function - uses these variables because they have already been validated
01154 void SetFaceShade( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FACETYPE *pFace, BOOLEAN fExternBlit )
01155 {
01156       // Set to default
01157       SetObjectHandleShade( pFace->uiVideoObject, FLASH_PORTRAIT_NOSHADE );
01158 
01159       if ( pFace->iVideoOverlay == -1 && !fExternBlit )
01160       {
01161             if ( ( pSoldier->bActionPoints == 0 ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01162             {
01163                   SetObjectHandleShade( pFace->uiVideoObject, FLASH_PORTRAIT_LITESHADE );
01164             }
01165       }
01166 
01167       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE  )
01168       {
01169             SetObjectHandleShade( pFace->uiVideoObject, FLASH_PORTRAIT_DARKSHADE );
01170       }
01171 
01172       // ATE: Don't shade for damage if blitting extern face...
01173       if ( !fExternBlit )
01174       {
01175             if ( pSoldier->fFlashPortrait == FLASH_PORTRAIT_START )
01176             {
01177                   SetObjectHandleShade( pFace->uiVideoObject, pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame );
01178             }
01179       }
01180 }
01181 
01182 BOOLEAN RenderAutoFaceFromSoldier( UINT8 ubSoldierID )
01183 {
01184       // Check for valid soldier
01185       CHECKF( ubSoldierID != NOBODY );
01186 
01187       return( RenderAutoFace( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->iFaceIndex ) );
01188 }
01189 
01190 void GetXYForIconPlacement( FACETYPE *pFace, UINT16 ubIndex, INT16 sFaceX, INT16 sFaceY, INT16 *psX, INT16 *psY )
01191 {
01192       INT16 sX, sY;
01193       UINT16 usWidth, usHeight;
01194   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
01195       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
01196 
01197 
01198       // Get height, width of icon...
01199       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiPORTRAITICONS );
01200       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ ubIndex ] );
01201       usHeight                      = pTrav->usHeight;
01202       usWidth                             = pTrav->usWidth;
01203 
01204       sX = sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth - usWidth - 1;
01205       sY = sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight - usHeight - 1;
01206 
01207       *psX = sX;
01208       *psY = sY;
01209 }
01210 
01211 void GetXYForRightIconPlacement( FACETYPE *pFace, UINT16 ubIndex, INT16 sFaceX, INT16 sFaceY, INT16 *psX, INT16 *psY, INT8 bNumIcons )
01212 {
01213       INT16 sX, sY;
01214       UINT16 usWidth, usHeight;
01215   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
01216       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
01217 
01218 
01219       // Get height, width of icon...
01220       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiPORTRAITICONS );
01221       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ ubIndex ] );
01222       usHeight                      = pTrav->usHeight;
01223       usWidth                             = pTrav->usWidth;
01224 
01225       sX = sFaceX + ( usWidth * bNumIcons ) + 1;
01226       sY = sFaceY + pFace->usFaceHeight - usHeight - 1;
01227 
01228       *psX = sX;
01229       *psY = sY;
01230 }
01231 
01232 
01233 
01234 void DoRightIcon( UINT32 uiRenderBuffer, FACETYPE *pFace, INT16 sFaceX, INT16 sFaceY, INT8 bNumIcons, INT8 sIconIndex )
01235 {
01236       INT16                               sIconX, sIconY;
01237 
01238       // Find X, y for placement
01239       GetXYForRightIconPlacement( pFace, sIconIndex, sFaceX, sFaceY, &sIconX, &sIconY, bNumIcons );
01240       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, guiPORTRAITICONS, sIconIndex, sIconX, sIconY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01241 }
01242 
01243 
01244 void HandleRenderFaceAdjustments( FACETYPE *pFace, BOOLEAN fDisplayBuffer, BOOLEAN fUseExternBuffer, UINT32 uiBuffer, INT16 sFaceX, INT16 sFaceY, UINT16 usEyesX, UINT16 usEyesY )
01245 {
01246       INT16                               sIconX, sIconY;
01247       INT16                               sIconIndex=-1;
01248       BOOLEAN                             fDoIcon = FALSE;
01249       UINT32                              uiRenderBuffer;
01250       INT16                               sPtsAvailable = 0;
01251       UINT16                              usMaximumPts = 0;
01252       CHAR16                              sString[ 32 ];
01253       UINT16                              usTextWidth;
01254       BOOLEAN                             fAtGunRange = FALSE;
01255       BOOLEAN                             fShowNumber = FALSE;
01256       BOOLEAN                             fShowMaximum = FALSE;
01257       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
01258       INT16                               sFontX, sFontY;
01259       INT16                               sX1, sY1, sY2, sX2; 
01260       UINT32                              uiDestPitchBYTES;
01261       UINT8                               *pDestBuf;
01262       UINT16                              usLineColor;
01263   INT8            bNumRightIcons = 0;
01264 
01265       // If we are using an extern buffer...
01266       if ( fUseExternBuffer )
01267       {
01268             uiRenderBuffer = uiBuffer;
01269       }
01270       else 
01271       {
01272             if ( fDisplayBuffer )
01273             {
01274                   uiRenderBuffer = pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer;
01275             }
01276             else
01277             {
01278                   uiRenderBuffer = pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer;
01279 
01280                   if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == FACE_NO_RESTORE_BUFFER )
01281                   {
01282                         return;
01283                   }
01284             }
01285       }
01286 
01287       // BLIT HATCH
01288       if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
01289       {
01290             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ];
01291 
01292             if ( ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS || MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->fDeadPanel ) )
01293             {
01294                   // Blit Closed eyes here!
01295                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, 1, usEyesX, usEyesY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01296 
01297                   // Blit hatch!
01298                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, guiHATCH, 0, sFaceX, sFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01299             }
01300 
01301             if( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->fMercAsleep == TRUE )
01302             {
01303                   // blit eyes closed
01304                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, 1, usEyesX, usEyesY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01305             }
01306 
01307             if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
01308             {
01309                   // IF we are in the process of doing any deal/close animations, show face, not skill...
01310                   if ( !pSoldier->fClosePanel && !pSoldier->fDeadPanel && !pSoldier->fUIdeadMerc && !pSoldier->fUICloseMerc )
01311                   {
01312                         // Put close panel there
01313                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, guiDEAD, 5, sFaceX, sFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01314 
01315                         // Blit hatch!
01316                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, guiHATCH, 0, sFaceX, sFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01317                   }
01318             }
01319 
01320     // ATE: If talking in popup, don't do the other things.....
01321     if ( pFace->fTalking && gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IN_ENDGAME_SEQUENCE )
01322     {
01323       return;
01324     }
01325 
01326             // ATE: Only do this, because we can be talking during an interrupt....
01327             if ( ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE ) && !fUseExternBuffer )
01328             {
01329                   // Don't do this if we are being handled elsewhere and it's not an extern buffer...
01330             }
01331             else
01332             {
01333                   HandleFaceHilights( pFace, uiRenderBuffer, sFaceX, sFaceY );
01334 
01335 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01336                   if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt != 0 )
01337 #else
01338                   if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
01339 #endif
01340                   {
01341                         SetFontDestBuffer( uiRenderBuffer, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01342 
01343                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bOppCnt );
01344 
01345                         SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
01346                         SetFontForeground( FONT_DKRED );
01347                         SetFontBackground( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01348 
01349                         sX1 = (INT16)( sFaceX );
01350                         sY1 = (INT16)( sFaceY ); 
01351 
01352                         sX2 = sX1 + StringPixLength( sString, TINYFONT1 ) + 1;
01353                         sY2 = sY1 + GetFontHeight( TINYFONT1 ) - 1;
01354 
01355                         mprintf( (INT16)( sX1 + 1), (INT16)( sY1 - 1 ), sString );
01356                         SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01357 
01358                         // Draw box
01359                         pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiRenderBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01360                         SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01361 
01362                         usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 105, 8, 9 ) );
01363                         RectangleDraw( TRUE, sX1, sY1, sX2, sY2, usLineColor, pDestBuf );
01364 
01365                         UnLockVideoSurface( uiRenderBuffer );                       
01366 
01367                   }
01368 
01369                   if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bInSector && ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != OUR_TEAM ) || !OK_INTERRUPT_MERC(  MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ] ) ) && !gfHiddenInterrupt ) || ( ( gfSMDisableForItems && !gfInItemPickupMenu ) && gusSMCurrentMerc == pFace->ubSoldierID && gsCurInterfacePanel == SM_PANEL ) )
01370                   {
01371                         // Blit hatch!
01372                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, guiHATCH, 0, sFaceX, sFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01373                   }
01374 
01375                   if ( !pFace->fDisabled && !pFace->fInvalidAnim )
01376                   {
01377                         // Render text above here if that's what was asked for
01378                         if ( pFace->fDisplayTextOver != FACE_NO_TEXT_OVER  )
01379                         {
01380                               SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
01381                               SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
01382                               SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );
01383 
01384                               SetFontDestBuffer( uiRenderBuffer, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01385 
01386                               VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sFaceX, sFaceY, pFace->usFaceWidth, pFace->usFaceHeight, TINYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, pFace->zDisplayText );
01387 
01388                               if ( pFace->fDisplayTextOver == FACE_DRAW_TEXT_OVER )
01389                               {
01390                                     gprintfinvalidate( sFontX, sFontY, (UINT16 *)pFace->zDisplayText );                 
01391                                     mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, pFace->zDisplayText );
01392                               }
01393                               else if ( pFace->fDisplayTextOver == FACE_ERASE_TEXT_OVER )
01394                               {
01395                                     gprintfRestore( sFontX, sFontY, (UINT16 *)pFace->zDisplayText );              
01396                                     pFace->fDisplayTextOver = FACE_NO_TEXT_OVER;
01397                               }
01398 
01399                               SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01400 
01401                         }
01402                   }
01403 
01404             }
01405 
01406     // Check if a robot and is not controlled....
01407         if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
01408         {
01409               if ( !CanRobotBeControlled( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ] ) )
01410       {
01411         // Not controlled robot
01412                     sIconIndex = 5;
01413                     fDoIcon          = TRUE;
01414       }
01415     }
01416 
01417     if ( ControllingRobot( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ] ) )
01418     {
01419       // controlling robot
01420                   sIconIndex = 4;
01421                   fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01422     }
01423 
01424     // If blind...
01425     if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bBlindedCounter > 0 )
01426     {
01427       DoRightIcon( uiRenderBuffer, pFace, sFaceX, sFaceY, bNumRightIcons, 6 );
01428       bNumRightIcons++;
01429     }
01430 
01431     if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
01432     {
01433       DoRightIcon( uiRenderBuffer, pFace, sFaceX, sFaceY, bNumRightIcons, 7 );
01434       bNumRightIcons++;
01435     }
01436 
01437         if ( GetDrunkLevel( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ] ) != SOBER )
01438         {
01439       DoRightIcon( uiRenderBuffer, pFace, sFaceX, sFaceY, bNumRightIcons, 8 );
01440       bNumRightIcons++;
01441     }
01442 
01443 
01444             switch( pSoldier->bAssignment )
01445             {
01446                   case DOCTOR:
01447 
01448                         sIconIndex = 1;
01449                         fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01450                         sPtsAvailable = CalculateHealingPointsForDoctor( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], &usMaximumPts, FALSE );
01451                         fShowNumber = TRUE;
01452                         fShowMaximum = TRUE;
01453 
01454                         // divide both amounts by 10 to make the displayed numbers a little more user-palatable (smaller)
01455                         sPtsAvailable = ( sPtsAvailable + 5 ) / 10;
01456                         usMaximumPts  = ( usMaximumPts + 5 ) / 10;
01457                         break;
01458 
01459                   case PATIENT:
01460 
01461                         sIconIndex = 2;
01462                         fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01463                         // show current health / maximum health
01464                         sPtsAvailable = MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bLife;
01465                         usMaximumPts  = MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bLifeMax;
01466                         fShowNumber = TRUE;
01467                         fShowMaximum = TRUE;
01468                         break;
01469 
01470                   case TRAIN_SELF:
01471                   case TRAIN_TOWN:
01472                   case TRAIN_TEAMMATE:
01473                   case TRAIN_BY_OTHER:
01474                         sIconIndex = 3;
01475                         fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01476                         fShowNumber = TRUE;
01477                         fShowMaximum = TRUE;
01478                         // there could be bonus pts for training at gun range
01479                         if ( ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->sSectorX == 13) && (MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_H) && (MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bSectorZ == 0) )
01480                         {
01481                               fAtGunRange = TRUE;
01482                         }
01483 
01484                         switch( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bAssignment )
01485                         {
01486                               case( TRAIN_SELF ):
01487                                     sPtsAvailable = GetSoldierTrainingPts( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bTrainStat, fAtGunRange, &usMaximumPts );
01488                                     break;
01489                               case( TRAIN_BY_OTHER ):
01490                                     sPtsAvailable = GetSoldierStudentPts( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bTrainStat, fAtGunRange, &usMaximumPts );
01491                                     break;
01492                               case( TRAIN_TOWN ):
01493                                     sPtsAvailable = GetTownTrainPtsForCharacter( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], &usMaximumPts );
01494                                     // divide both amounts by 10 to make the displayed numbers a little more user-palatable (smaller)
01495                                     sPtsAvailable = ( sPtsAvailable + 5 ) / 10;
01496                                     usMaximumPts  = ( usMaximumPts + 5 ) / 10;
01497                                     break;
01498                               case( TRAIN_TEAMMATE ):
01499                                     sPtsAvailable = GetBonusTrainingPtsDueToInstructor( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], NULL , MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->bTrainStat, fAtGunRange, &usMaximumPts );
01500                                     break;
01501                         }
01502                         break;
01503 
01504                   case REPAIR:
01505 
01506                         sIconIndex = 0;
01507                         fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01508                         sPtsAvailable = CalculateRepairPointsForRepairman( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], &usMaximumPts, FALSE );
01509                         fShowNumber = TRUE;
01510                         fShowMaximum = TRUE;
01511 
01512                         // check if we are repairing a vehicle
01513                         if ( Menptr[ pFace->ubSoldierID ].bVehicleUnderRepairID != -1 )
01514                         {
01515                               // reduce to a multiple of VEHICLE_REPAIR_POINTS_DIVISOR.  This way skill too low will show up as 0 repair pts.
01516                               sPtsAvailable -= ( sPtsAvailable % VEHICLE_REPAIR_POINTS_DIVISOR );
01517                               usMaximumPts  -= ( usMaximumPts  % VEHICLE_REPAIR_POINTS_DIVISOR );
01518                         }
01519 
01520                         break;
01521             }
01522 
01523             // Check for being serviced...
01524             if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->ubServicePartner != NOBODY )
01525             {
01526                   // Doctor...
01527                   sIconIndex = 1;
01528                   fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01529             }
01530 
01531             if ( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ]->ubServiceCount != 0 )
01532             {
01533                   // Patient
01534                   sIconIndex = 2;
01535                   fDoIcon            = TRUE;
01536             }
01537 
01538             
01539             if ( fDoIcon )
01540             {
01541                   // Find X, y for placement
01542                   GetXYForIconPlacement( pFace, sIconIndex, sFaceX, sFaceY, &sIconX, &sIconY );
01543                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiRenderBuffer, guiPORTRAITICONS, sIconIndex, sIconX, sIconY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01544 
01545       // ATE: Show numbers only in mapscreen
01546                   if( fShowNumber )
01547                   {
01548                         SetFontDestBuffer( uiRenderBuffer, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01549 
01550                         if ( fShowMaximum )
01551                         {
01552                               swprintf( sString, L"%d/%d", sPtsAvailable, usMaximumPts );
01553                         }
01554                         else
01555                         {
01556                               swprintf( sString, L"%d", sPtsAvailable );
01557                         }
01558 
01559                         usTextWidth = StringPixLength( sString, FONT10ARIAL );
01560                         usTextWidth += 1;
01561 
01562                         SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01563                         SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01564                         SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01565 
01566                         mprintf(  sFaceX + pFace->usFaceWidth - usTextWidth, ( INT16 )( sFaceY + 3 ), sString );
01567                         SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01568                   }
01569             }
01570       }
01571   else
01572   {
01573             if ( pFace->ubCharacterNum == FATHER || pFace->ubCharacterNum == MICKY )
01574     {
01575       if ( gMercProfiles[ pFace->ubCharacterNum ].bNPCData >= 5 )
01576       {
01577         DoRightIcon( uiRenderBuffer, pFace, sFaceX, sFaceY, 0, 8 );
01578       }
01579     }
01580   }
01581 }
01582 
01583 
01584 BOOLEAN RenderAutoFace( INT32 iFaceIndex )
01585 {
01586       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
01587 
01588       // Check face index
01589       CHECKF( iFaceIndex != -1 );
01590 
01591       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
01592 
01593       // Check for a valid slot!
01594       CHECKF( pFace->fAllocated != FALSE );
01595 
01596       // Check for disabled guy!
01597       CHECKF( pFace->fDisabled != TRUE );
01598 
01599       // Set shade
01600       if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
01601       {
01602             SetFaceShade( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], pFace, FALSE );
01603       }
01604 
01605       // Blit face to save buffer!
01606       if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer != FACE_NO_RESTORE_BUFFER )
01607       {
01608             if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
01609             {
01610                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, 0, pFace->usFaceX, pFace->usFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01611             }
01612             else
01613             {
01614                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, 0, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01615             }
01616       }
01617 
01618       HandleRenderFaceAdjustments( pFace, FALSE, FALSE, 0, pFace->usFaceX, pFace->usFaceY, pFace->usEyesX, pFace->usEyesY );
01619 
01620       // Restore extern rect
01621       if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
01622       {
01623             FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, (INT16)( pFace->usFaceX ), (INT16)( pFace->usFaceY ), (INT16)( pFace->usFaceX ), (INT16)( pFace->usFaceY ), ( INT16)( pFace->usFaceWidth ), (INT16)( pFace->usFaceHeight ) );
01624       }
01625       else
01626       {
01627             FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usFaceX, pFace->usFaceY, 0, 0, pFace->usFaceWidth, pFace->usFaceHeight );
01628       }
01629 
01630       return( TRUE );
01631 }
01632 
01633 
01634 BOOLEAN ExternRenderFaceFromSoldier( UINT32 uiBuffer, UINT8 ubSoldierID, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
01635 {
01636       // Check for valid soldier
01637       CHECKF( ubSoldierID != NOBODY );
01638 
01639       return( ExternRenderFace( uiBuffer, MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->iFaceIndex, sX, sY ) );
01640 }
01641 
01642 
01643 BOOLEAN ExternRenderFace( UINT32 uiBuffer, INT32 iFaceIndex, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
01644 {
01645       UINT16                                    usEyesX;
01646       UINT16                                    usEyesY;
01647       UINT16                                    usMouthX;
01648       UINT16                                    usMouthY;
01649       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
01650 
01651       // Check face index
01652       CHECKF( iFaceIndex != -1 );
01653 
01654       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
01655 
01656       // Check for a valid slot!
01657       CHECKF( pFace->fAllocated != FALSE );
01658 
01659       // Here, any face can be rendered, even if disabled
01660 
01661       // Set shade
01662       if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
01663       {     
01664             SetFaceShade( MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ], pFace , TRUE );
01665       }
01666 
01667       // Blit face to save buffer!
01668       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( uiBuffer, pFace->uiVideoObject, 0, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01669 
01670       GetFaceRelativeCoordinates( pFace, &usEyesX, &usEyesY, &usMouthX, &usMouthY );
01671 
01672       HandleRenderFaceAdjustments( pFace, FALSE, TRUE, uiBuffer, sX, sY, ( UINT16)( sX + usEyesX ), ( UINT16)( sY + usEyesY ) );
01673 
01674       // Restore extern rect
01675       if ( uiBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
01676       {
01677             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sX, sY, pFace->usFaceWidth, pFace->usFaceWidth );
01678       }
01679 
01680       return( TRUE );
01681 }
01682 
01683 
01684 
01685 void NewEye( FACETYPE *pFace )
01686 {
01687 
01688  switch(pFace->sEyeFrame)
01689  {
01690   case 0 : //pFace->sEyeFrame = (INT16)Random(2);     // normal - can blink or frown
01691                   if ( pFace->ubExpression == ANGRY )
01692                   {
01693                         pFace->ubEyeWait = 0;
01694                         pFace->sEyeFrame = 3;
01695                   }
01696                   else if ( pFace->ubExpression == SURPRISED )
01697                   {
01698                         pFace->ubEyeWait = 0;
01699                         pFace->sEyeFrame = 4;
01700                   }
01701                   else
01702          //if (pFace->sEyeFrame && Talk.talking && Talk.expression != DYING)
01703          ///    pFace->sEyeFrame = 3;
01704          //else
01705              pFace->sEyeFrame = 1;
01706          break;
01707   case 1 : // starting to blink  - has to finish unless dying
01708          //if (Talk.expression == DYING)
01709          //    pFace->sEyeFrame = 1;
01710          //else
01711              pFace->sEyeFrame = 2;
01712          break;
01713   case 2 : //pFace->sEyeFrame = (INT16)Random(2);     // finishing blink - can go normal or frown
01714          //if (pFace->sEyeFrame && Talk.talking)
01715          //    pFace->sEyeFrame = 3;
01716          //else
01717          //   if (Talk.expression == ANGRY)
01718              // pFace->sEyeFrame = 3;
01719          //   else
01720               pFace->sEyeFrame = 0;
01721          break;
01722 
01723   case 3 : //pFace->sEyeFrame = 4; break; // frown
01724 
01725                   pFace->ubEyeWait++;
01726 
01727                   if ( pFace->ubEyeWait > 6 )
01728                   {
01729                         pFace->sEyeFrame = 0;
01730                   }
01731                   break;
01732 
01733   case 4 : 
01734 
01735                   pFace->ubEyeWait++;
01736 
01737                   if ( pFace->ubEyeWait > 6 )
01738                   {
01739                         pFace->sEyeFrame = 0;
01740                   }
01741                   break;
01742 
01743   case 5 : pFace->sEyeFrame = 6;
01744 
01745             pFace->sEyeFrame = 0;
01746          break;
01747                   
01748   case 6 : pFace->sEyeFrame = 7; break;
01749   case 7 : pFace->sEyeFrame = (INT16)Random(2); // can stop frowning or continue
01750          //if (pFace->sEyeFrame && Talk.expression != DYING)
01751           //   pFace->sEyeFrame = 8;
01752          //else
01753          //    pFace->sEyeFrame = 0;
01754          //break;
01755   case 8 : pFace->sEyeFrame =  9; break;
01756   case 9 : pFace->sEyeFrame = 10; break;
01757   case 10: pFace->sEyeFrame = 11; break;
01758   case 11: pFace->sEyeFrame = 12; break;
01759   case 12: pFace->sEyeFrame =  0; break;
01760  }
01761 }
01762 
01763 
01764 void NewMouth( FACETYPE *pFace )
01765 {
01766  BOOLEAN OK       = FALSE;
01767  UINT16 sOld      = pFace->sMouthFrame;
01768 
01769 // if (audio_gap_active == 1)
01770  //  {
01771  //   Talk.mouth = 0;
01772  //   return;
01773  //  }
01774 
01775  do
01776  {
01777   //Talk.mouth = random(4);
01778 
01779   pFace->sMouthFrame = (INT16)Random(6);
01780 
01781   if ( pFace->sMouthFrame > 3)
01782       {
01783     pFace->sMouthFrame = 0;
01784       }
01785 
01786   switch( sOld) 
01787   {
01788     case 0 : if ( pFace->sMouthFrame != 0 )
01789            OK = TRUE;
01790            break;
01791     case 1 : if ( pFace->sMouthFrame != 1 )
01792                    OK = TRUE;
01793            break;
01794     case 2 : if ( pFace->sMouthFrame != 2 )
01795                OK = TRUE;
01796            break;
01797     case 3 : if ( pFace->sMouthFrame != 3 )
01798                OK = TRUE;
01799            break;
01800   }
01801 
01802  } while (!OK);
01803 
01804 }
