01806 
01807 void HandleAutoFaces( )
01808 {
01809       UINT32 uiCount;
01810       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
01811       INT8  bLife;
01812       INT8  bInSector;
01813       INT8  bAPs;
01814       BOOLEAN     fRerender = FALSE;
01815       BOOLEAN     fHandleFace;
01816       BOOLEAN     fHandleUIHatch;
01817       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01818 
01819 
01820       for ( uiCount = 0; uiCount < guiNumFaces; uiCount++ )
01821       {
01822             fRerender = FALSE;
01823             fHandleFace = TRUE;
01824             fHandleUIHatch = FALSE;
01825 
01826             // OK, NOW, check if our bLife status has changed, re-render if so!
01827             if ( gFacesData[ uiCount ].fAllocated  )
01828             {
01829                   pFace = &gFacesData[ uiCount ];
01830 
01831                   // Are we a soldier?
01832                   if ( pFace->ubSoldierID != NOBODY )
01833                   {
01834                          // Get Life now
01835                          pSoldier  = MercPtrs[ pFace->ubSoldierID ];
01836                          bLife             = pSoldier->bLife;
01837                          bInSector = pSoldier->bInSector;
01838                          bAPs      = pSoldier->bActionPoints;
01839 
01840                          if ( pSoldier->ubID == gsSelectedGuy && gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy )
01841                          {
01842                                pFace->uiFlags |= FACE_SHOW_WHITE_HILIGHT;
01843                          }
01844                          else
01845                          {
01846                                pFace->uiFlags &= ( ~FACE_SHOW_WHITE_HILIGHT );
01847                          }
01848 
01849                          if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != pSoldier->sFinalDestination && pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01850                          {
01851                                pFace->uiFlags |= FACE_SHOW_MOVING_HILIGHT;
01852                          }
01853                          else
01854                          {
01855                                pFace->uiFlags &= ( ~FACE_SHOW_MOVING_HILIGHT );
01856                          }
01857 
01858                          if ( pSoldier->bStealthMode != pFace->bOldStealthMode )
01859                          {
01860                                fRerender = TRUE;
01861                          }
01862 
01863                          // Check if we have fallen below OKLIFE...
01864                          if ( bLife < OKLIFE && pFace->bOldSoldierLife >= OKLIFE )
01865                          {
01866                                fRerender = TRUE;
01867                          }
01868 
01869                          if ( bLife >= OKLIFE && pFace->bOldSoldierLife < OKLIFE )
01870                          {
01871                                fRerender = TRUE;
01872                          }
01873 
01874                          // Check if we have fallen below CONSCIOUSNESS
01875                          if ( bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS && pFace->bOldSoldierLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
01876                          {
01877                                fRerender = TRUE;
01878                          }
01879                          
01880                          if ( bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS && pFace->bOldSoldierLife < CONSCIOUSNESS )
01881                          {
01882                                fRerender = TRUE;
01883                          }
01884 
01885                          if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt != pFace->bOldOppCnt )
01886                          {
01887                                fRerender = TRUE;
01888                          }
01889 
01890                          // Check if assignment is idfferent....
01891                          if ( pSoldier->bAssignment != pFace->bOldAssignment )
01892                          {
01893                                     pFace->bOldAssignment = pSoldier->bAssignment;
01894                                     fRerender = TRUE;
01895                          }
01896 
01897                          // Check if we have fallen below CONSCIOUSNESS
01898                          if ( bAPs == 0 && pFace->bOldActionPoints > 0 )
01899                          {
01900                                fRerender = TRUE;
01901                          }
01902                          
01903                          if ( bAPs > 0  && pFace->bOldActionPoints == 0 )
01904                          {
01905                                fRerender = TRUE;
01906                          }
01907 
01908                          if ( !( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_WHITE_HILIGHT ) && pFace->fOldShowHighlight )
01909                          {
01910                                fRerender = TRUE;                                    
01911                          }
01912 
01913                          if ( ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_WHITE_HILIGHT ) && !( pFace->fOldShowHighlight ) )
01914                          {
01915                                fRerender = TRUE;                                    
01916                          }
01917 
01918                          if ( !( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_MOVING_HILIGHT ) && pFace->fOldShowMoveHilight )
01919                          {
01920                                fRerender = TRUE;                                    
01921                          }
01922 
01923                          if ( ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_MOVING_HILIGHT ) && !( pFace->fOldShowMoveHilight ) )
01924                          {
01925                                fRerender = TRUE;                                    
01926                          }
01927 
01928                          if ( pFace->ubOldServiceCount != pSoldier->ubServiceCount )
01929                          {
01930                                fRerender = TRUE;
01931                                pFace->ubOldServiceCount = pSoldier->ubServiceCount;
01932                          }
01933 
01934                          if ( pFace->fOldCompatibleItems != pFace->fCompatibleItems || gfInItemPickupMenu || gpItemPointer != NULL )
01935                          {
01936                                fRerender = TRUE;
01937                                pFace->fOldCompatibleItems = pFace->fCompatibleItems;
01938                          }
01939 
01940 
01941                          if ( pFace->ubOldServicePartner != pSoldier->ubServicePartner )
01942                          {
01943                                fRerender = TRUE;
01944                                pFace->ubOldServicePartner = pSoldier->ubServicePartner;
01945                          }
01946 
01947                          pFace->fOldHandleUIHatch = fHandleUIHatch;
01948                          pFace->bOldSoldierLife       = bLife;
01949                          pFace->bOldActionPoints      = bAPs;
01950                          pFace->bOldStealthMode       = pSoldier->bStealthMode;
01951                          pFace->bOldOppCnt                        = pSoldier->bOppCnt;
01952 
01953                          if ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_WHITE_HILIGHT )
01954                          {
01955                                     pFace->fOldShowHighlight = TRUE;
01956                          }
01957                          else
01958                          {
01959                                     pFace->fOldShowHighlight = FALSE;
01960                          }
01961 
01962                          if ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_SHOW_MOVING_HILIGHT ) 
01963                          {
01964                                     pFace->fOldShowMoveHilight = TRUE;                           
01965                          }
01966                          else
01967                          {
01968                                     pFace->fOldShowMoveHilight = FALSE;                          
01969                          }
01970 
01971 
01972                               if ( pSoldier->fGettingHit && pSoldier->fFlashPortrait == FLASH_PORTRAIT_STOP )
01973                               {
01974                                     pSoldier->fFlashPortrait = TRUE;
01975                                     pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame = FLASH_PORTRAIT_STARTSHADE;
01976                                     RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PortraitFlashCounter, FLASH_PORTRAIT_DELAY );
01977                                     fRerender = TRUE;                         
01978                               }
01979                               if ( pSoldier->fFlashPortrait == FLASH_PORTRAIT_START )
01980                               {
01981                                     // Loop through flash values
01982                                     if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->PortraitFlashCounter, FLASH_PORTRAIT_DELAY ) )
01983                                     {                             
01984                                           RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PortraitFlashCounter, FLASH_PORTRAIT_DELAY );
01985                                           pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame++;
01986 
01987                                           if ( pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame > FLASH_PORTRAIT_ENDSHADE )
01988                                           {
01989                                                 pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame = FLASH_PORTRAIT_ENDSHADE;
01990 
01991                                                 if ( pSoldier->fGettingHit )
01992                                                 {
01993                                                       pSoldier->fFlashPortrait = FLASH_PORTRAIT_WAITING;
01994                                                 }
01995                                                 else
01996                                                 {
01997                                                       // Render face again!
01998                                                       pSoldier->fFlashPortrait = FLASH_PORTRAIT_STOP;
01999                                                 }
02000 
02001                                                 fRerender = TRUE;                         
02002                                           }
02003                                     }
02004                               }
02005                               // CHECK IF WE WERE WAITING FOR GETTING HIT TO FINISH!
02006                               if ( !pSoldier->fGettingHit && pSoldier->fFlashPortrait == FLASH_PORTRAIT_WAITING )
02007                               {
02008                                     pSoldier->fFlashPortrait = FALSE;
02009                                     fRerender = TRUE;                         
02010                               }
02011 
02012                               if ( pSoldier->fFlashPortrait == FLASH_PORTRAIT_START )
02013                               {
02014                                     fRerender = TRUE;                         
02015                               }
02016 
02017                          if( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_REDRAW_WHOLE_FACE_NEXT_FRAME )
02018                          {
02019                                pFace->uiFlags &= ~FACE_REDRAW_WHOLE_FACE_NEXT_FRAME;
02020 
02021                                fRerender = TRUE;
02022                          }
02023 
02024          if (     fInterfacePanelDirty == DIRTYLEVEL2 && guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
02025          {
02026                                fRerender = TRUE;
02027          }
02028 
02029                          if ( fRerender )
02030                          {
02031                                     RenderAutoFace( uiCount );
02032                          }
02033 
02034                          if ( bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS )
02035                          {
02036                                fHandleFace = FALSE;
02037                          }
02038                   }
02039 
02040                   if ( fHandleFace )
02041                   {
02042                         BlinkAutoFace( uiCount );
02043                   }
02044 
02045                   MouthAutoFace( uiCount );
02046 
02047             }
02048 
02049       }
02050       
02051 }

02053 void HandleTalkingAutoFaces( )
02054 {
02055       UINT32 uiCount;
02056       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
02057 
02058       for ( uiCount = 0; uiCount < guiNumFaces; uiCount++ )
02059       {
02060             // OK, NOW, check if our bLife status has changed, re-render if so!
02061             if ( gFacesData[ uiCount ].fAllocated  )
02062             {
02063                   pFace = &gFacesData[ uiCount ];
02064 
02065                   HandleTalkingAutoFace( uiCount );
02066 
02067             }
02068       }     
02069 }

02072 
02073 BOOLEAN FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( INT32 iFaceIndex, INT16 sDestLeft, INT16 sDestTop, INT16 sSrcLeft, INT16 sSrcTop, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight )
02074 {
02075       FACETYPE                            *pFace;
02076       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
02077       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
02078 
02079       // Check face index
02080       CHECKF( iFaceIndex != -1 );
02081 
02082       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
02083 
02084       // DOn't continue if we do not want the resotre to happen ( ei blitting entrie thing every frame...
02085       if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == FACE_NO_RESTORE_BUFFER )
02086       {
02087             return( FALSE );
02088       }
02089 
02090       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
02091       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
02092 
02093       Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
02094                         (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
02095                         sDestLeft , sDestTop, 
02096                         sSrcLeft , sSrcTop, 
02097                         sWidth, sHeight);
02098 
02099       UnLockVideoSurface(pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer);
02100       UnLockVideoSurface(pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer);
02101 
02102       // Add rect to frame buffer queue
02103       if ( pFace->uiAutoDisplayBuffer == FRAME_BUFFER )
02104       {
02105             InvalidateRegionEx( sDestLeft - 2, sDestTop - 2, (sDestLeft + sWidth + 3), ( sDestTop + sHeight + 2 ), 0 );
02106       }
02107       return(TRUE);
02108 }

02110 BOOLEAN SetFaceTalking( INT32 iFaceIndex, CHAR8 *zSoundFile, STR16 zTextString, 
02111                                     UINT32 usRate, UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops, UINT32 uiPan )
02112 {
02113       FACETYPE                *pFace;
02114       
02115       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
02116 
02117       // Set face to talking
02118       pFace->fTalking = TRUE;
02119       pFace->fAnimatingTalking = TRUE;
02120       pFace->fFinishTalking = FALSE;
02121 
02122   if ( !AreInMeanwhile( ) )
02123   {
02124     TurnOnSectorLocator( pFace->ubCharacterNum );
02125   }
02126 
02127       // Play sample
02128       if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SPEECH ] )
02129             pFace->uiSoundID = PlayJA2GapSample( zSoundFile, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN, &(pFace->GapList ) );
02130       else
02131             pFace->uiSoundID = SOUND_ERROR;
02132 
02133       if ( pFace->uiSoundID != SOUND_ERROR )
02134       {
02135             pFace->fValidSpeech     = TRUE;
02136             
02137             pFace->uiTalkingFromVeryBeginningTimer = GetJA2Clock( );
02138       }
02139       else
02140       {
02141             pFace->fValidSpeech     = FALSE;
02142 
02143             // Set delay based on sound...
02144             pFace->uiTalkingTimer = pFace->uiTalkingFromVeryBeginningTimer = GetJA2Clock( );
02145 
02146             pFace->uiTalkingDuration = FindDelayForString( zTextString );
02147       }
02148 
02149       return( TRUE );
02150 }

02171 
02172 void InternalShutupaYoFace( INT32 iFaceIndex, BOOLEAN fForce )
02173 {
02174       FACETYPE                *pFace;
02175 
02176       // Check face index
02177       CHECKV( iFaceIndex != -1 );
02178       
02179       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
02180 
02181       if ( pFace->fTalking )
02182       {
02183             // OK, only do this if we have been talking for a min. amount fo time...
02184             if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - pFace->uiTalkingFromVeryBeginningTimer ) < 500 && !fForce )
02185             {
02186                   return;
02187             }
02188 
02189             if ( pFace->uiSoundID != SOUND_ERROR )
02190             {
02191                   SoundStop( pFace->uiSoundID );
02192             }
02193 
02194             // Remove gap info
02195             AudioGapListDone( &(pFace->GapList) );
02196 
02197             // Shutup mouth!
02198             pFace->sMouthFrame = 0;
02199 
02200             // ATE: Only change if active!
02201             if ( !pFace->fDisabled )
02202             {
02203                   if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
02204                   {
02205                         FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
02206                   }
02207                   else
02208                   {
02209                         FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( iFaceIndex, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthOffsetX, pFace->usMouthOffsetY,  pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
02210                   }
02211             }
02212             // OK, smart guy, make sure this guy has finished talking,
02213             // before attempting to end dialogue UI.
02214             pFace->fTalking = FALSE;
02215 
02216             // Call dialogue handler function
02217             HandleDialogueEnd( pFace );
02218 
02219             pFace->fTalking = FALSE;
02220             pFace->fAnimatingTalking = FALSE;
02221 
02222             gfUIWaitingForUserSpeechAdvance = FALSE;
02223 
02224       }
02225 
02226 }
02227 
02228 void ShutupaYoFace( INT32 iFaceIndex )
02229 {
02230       InternalShutupaYoFace( iFaceIndex, TRUE );
02231 }

02233 void SetupFinalTalkingDelay( FACETYPE *pFace )
02234 {
02235       pFace->fFinishTalking = TRUE;
02236 
02237       pFace->fAnimatingTalking = FALSE;
02238 
02239       pFace->uiTalkingTimer = GetJA2Clock( );
02240 
02241       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ]  )
02242       {
02243             //pFace->uiTalkingDuration = FINAL_TALKING_DURATION;
02244             pFace->uiTalkingDuration = 300;
02245       }
02246       else
02247       {
02248             pFace->uiTalkingDuration = 300;
02249       }
02250 
02251       pFace->sMouthFrame = 0;
02252 
02253       // Close mouth!
02254       if ( !pFace->fDisabled )
02255       {
02256             if ( pFace->uiAutoRestoreBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
02257             {
02258                   FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( pFace->iID, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
02259             }
02260             else
02261             {
02262                   FaceRestoreSavedBackgroundRect( pFace->iID, pFace->usMouthX, pFace->usMouthY, pFace->usMouthOffsetX, pFace->usMouthOffsetY, pFace->usMouthWidth, pFace->usMouthHeight );
02263             }
02264       }
02265 
02266       // Setup flag to wait for advance ( because we have no text! )
02267       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_KEY_ADVANCE_SPEECH ] && ( pFace->uiFlags & FACE_POTENTIAL_KEYWAIT ) )
02268       {
02269 
02270             // Check if we have had valid speech!
02271             if ( !pFace->fValidSpeech || gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] )
02272             {
02273                   // Set false!
02274                   pFace->fFinishTalking = FALSE;
02275                   // Set waiting for advance to true!
02276                   gfUIWaitingForUserSpeechAdvance = TRUE;
02277             }
02278       }
02279 
02280       // Set final delay!
02281       pFace->fValidSpeech = FALSE;
02282 
02283 
02284 }
